title: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again but expecting different results. What do you do over and over again but expect different results? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lately my problem is doing the same thing over and over again and Not getting the same results. I must not be paying attention to what I am doing. I have made soup the same way for a long time. But every pot tastes different. Not bad but not the same. Isn't it strange, in psychology insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different outcome. I other sciences doing the same thing over and over and getting different outcomes proves your wrong. Why do people have such a hard time accepting they are not getting what they are expecting.

Ask the same question to the same person.. Asking my guy friend to come spend the night almost nightly.. knowing he always has a reason he cant . And wont change up what he is doing in order to tell me yes.
